full_summary:
Revision Date: 2023-05-01
Title: Amherstburg Canadian Coast Guard Base Wharf Phase 2 Repairs - Phase 1 Invitation to Qualify

Classification: Building Maintenance and Repair Services, Marine Construction Services

Overview:

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Real Property Branch, invites interested contractors to qualify for a two-phase project to renovate the Amherstburg facility in Amherstburg, Ontario. The project encompasses Phase 2 repairs for the Canadian Coast Guard Base wharf.

**Project Details**

* Duration: 24 weeks from the date of acceptance of the offer
* Location: Amherstburg Coast Guard Base, Amherstburg, Ontario
* Contract Type: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

**Bid Requirements**

* Bidders are required to submit a qualification package in accordance with the terms and conditions stated in the SAP Ariba Discovery posting.
* The qualification package should include all necessary bid documents, certificates, and insurance policies.
* The submission deadline is 2:00 PM EDT on 2023-05-04. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. [1]

**Evaluation Criteria**

The contractor will be evaluated based on their ability to fulfill the project requirements outlined in the terms and conditions. The evaluation will have two phases:

* Phase 1: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) will assess the qualifications of interested contractors.
* Phase 2: Top qualified contractors will be invited to submit a financial bid on the project. [2]

**Contract Specifications**

The selected contractor is expected to renovate the Amherstburg facility within the specified timeframe. The contractor must provide and deliver outstanding professional services and adher to all applicable regulations and code requirements.

**Key Dates**

* Notice Release Date: 2023-04-17
* Amendment Date: 2023-05-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-04 at 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-12-31

**Notice Information**

This invitation to qualify has been posted on the SAP Ariba Discovery platform. Interested contractors can access complete details by visiting the platform through the provided link.

Contact Information:

For further information, contact Carter Gooch at Carter.Gooch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

References:

[1] Tender Closing Notice.
[2] Contract Specifications.
